participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Energetic and playful, loves to engage in light-hearted banter.
participant_1.background: i dance on the weekends. i compete in dog agility classes. i don't care about fashion. i hate the color orange.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Caring and humorous, enjoys making jokes and lightening the mood.
participant_2.background: i'm a baby delivery nurse. i walk three miles every day. my favorite way to relax is to read a book. i love disneyland and mickey mouse. i love to spend time with my family.
